Translations.Text: Yakhana tamra raba pabitra upatyaka ‘tu'oya’ya tamke deke balechilena
‘phira‘a'unera kache yana, se to simalanghana kareche,’
atahpara baluna, ‘tomara ki agraha ache ye, tumi pabitra ha'o—
‘ara ami tomake tomara rabera dike pathapradarsana kari, yate tumi tamke bhaya kara?’
Atahpara tini take mahanidarsana dekhalena
Kintu se mithyaropa karala ebam abadhya hala
Tarapara se pichane phire pratibidhane sacesta hala
Atahpara se sakalake samabeta kare ghosana dila
atahpara balala, ‘ami'i tomadera sarbocca raba.’
Atahpara allah take akherate o duniyaya kathina sastite pakara'o karalena
Niscaya ye bhaya kare tara jan'ya to ete siksa rayeche
Tomaderake [1] srsti kara kathina, na asamana srsti? Tini'i ta nirmana karechena
tini era chadake su'ucca karechena o subin'yasta karechena
Ara tini era ratake karechena andhakaracchanna ebam prakasa karechena era suryaloka
ara yaminake era para bistrta karechena
Tini ta theke bera karechena tara pani o trnabhumi
ara parbatake tini drrhabhabe prothita karechena
esaba tomadera o tomadera catuspada jantugulora bhogera jan'ya
Atahpara yakhana mahasankata upasthita habe
manusa ya kareche ta se sedina smarana karabe
ara prakasa kara habe jahannama darsakadera jan'ya
sutaram ye simalanghana kare
ebam duniyara jibanake agraadhikara deya
Jahannama'i habe tara abasa
Ara ye tara rabera abasthanake [1] bhaya kare ebam kuprabrtti hate nijake birata rakhe
jannata'i habe tara abasa
Tara apanake jijnesa kare, ‘kiyamata samparke, ta kakhana ghatabe?’
Ta alocanara ki jnana apanara ache
era parama jnana apanara rabera'i kache
ye etara bhaya rakhe apani sudhu tara satarkakari
Yedina tara ta dekhate pabe sedina tadera mane habe yena tara duniyaya matra eka sandhya athaba eka prabhata abasthana kareche
